# TASK::GET_IS_TASK_ACTIVE

## Summary
Checks if a code task is running on a ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **CODE_TASK** taskID

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Task index enum: https://alloc8or.re/gta5/doc/enums/eTaskTypeIndex.txt
